entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:11 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:11 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 23.
